```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(glue)
library(rStrava)
library(ggplot2)
```

## My Most Recent Workout

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
workouts <- read_csv("data/strava_activities.csv")

latest <- workouts %>%
  arrange(desc(date)) %>%
  slice(1)

cat("Most recent activity:", latest$activity_name, "on", latest$date, "\n")
cat("Type:", latest$type, "\n")
cat("Distance:", round(latest$distance_miles, 2), "mi\n")
cat("Speed:", round(latest$pace_min_mile, 1), "min/mi\n")

# Simple chart
ggplot(workouts, aes(x = date, y = distance_miles)) +
  geom_line(fill = "steelblue") +
  labs(title = "Recent Workouts", x = "Date", y = "Distance (km)")

```
